faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our digital marketing services

items.question: How much does it cost to start digital marketing services?
items.answer: We have packages starting from 99,000 MMK per month. You can choose based on your business needs.

items.question: What platforms can I advertise on?
items.answer: In addition to Facebook, Telegram, and Google Ads, you can also advertise on Instagram, YouTube, and TikTok.

items.question: How long does it take to create an ad campaign?
items.answer: Typically, we can start within 2-3 days. However, the duration may vary depending on the campaign size and complexity.

items.question: How do you manage advertising budgets?
items.answer: We use AI algorithms to optimize your budget for maximum effectiveness. We also perform daily optimizations if needed.

items.question: How can I measure the results of the service?
items.answer: We provide detailed monthly reports measuring metrics such as reach, engagement, conversion, and ROI of your advertisements.
